name: redoubt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal something that holds or defends a belief or a way of life, especially one that is disappearing or threatened: He described British public schools as "the last redoubt of upper-class privilege".
military
  specialized a small, often hidden building in which soldiers can hide while they are fighting
